recipes.name: One-Pan Chicken & Broccoli Rice
steps: Heat 1 tbsp oil in large pan over medium-high heat
Add diced chicken, season with salt and pepper, cook 5-6 minutes until browned
Add broccoli and onions, cook 3 minutes until slightly tender
Add 1 cup rice and 2 cups water or broth, bring to boil
Reduce heat to low, cover, simmer 15 minutes until rice is cooked
Sprinkle cheese on top, cover for 1 minute to melt, serve hot

recipes.name: Quick Beef Tacos
steps: Brown ground beef in skillet over medium-high heat, breaking into crumbles
Add diced onion, cook 3 minutes until softened
Add 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, salt to taste
Warm tortillas in microwave for 30 seconds
Fill tortillas with beef mixture
Top with diced tomatoes and shredded cheese

recipes.name: Cheesy Scrambled Eggs with Toast
steps: Whisk eggs with 2 tbsp milk, salt, and pepper
Melt butter in non-stick pan over medium-low heat
Add spinach, cook 1 minute until wilted
Pour in eggs, gently stir with spatula as they cook
When almost set, fold in cheese
Toast bread and serve eggs alongside

recipes.name: Turkey & Veggie Stir-Fry
steps: Cook ground turkey in large skillet until browned, set aside
Add 1 tbsp oil to same pan, add carrots and cook 2 minutes
Add bell peppers, broccoli, and onion, stir-fry 4-5 minutes
Return turkey to pan
Add 3 tbsp soy sauce and 1 tsp sesame oil, toss to combine
Serve over rice or noodles

recipes.name: Simple Baked Chicken Thighs with Potatoes
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F
Toss potatoes, carrots, and onion with 2 tbsp oil, salt, pepper
Spread vegetables on sheet pan
Season chicken with salt, pepper, paprika, place on top of veggies
Roast 25 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F
Let rest 5 minutes before serving

recipes.name: Creamy Tomato Pasta
steps: Cook 1 lb pasta according to package, reserve 1 cup pasta water
In large pan, melt butter over medium heat
Add canned tomatoes with juice, simmer 5 minutes
Stir in 1/4 cup cream or milk and parmesan cheese
Add spinach, stir until wilted
Toss with pasta, adding pasta water to reach desired consistency

recipes.name: Beef & Broccoli
steps: Brown ground beef in large skillet, drain excess fat
Add sliced onion and carrots, cook 3 minutes
Add broccoli florets and 1/4 cup water, cover and steam 4 minutes
Mix 3 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tsp garlic
Pour sauce over beef and veggies, toss to coat
Serve over steamed rice

recipes.name: Quesadillas with Chicken
ingredients: chicken breast (1 lb, cooked and shredded)
steps: Sauté bell peppers and onion until soft, about 4 minutes
Mix cooked vegetables with shredded chicken
Place tortilla in dry skillet over medium heat
Add cheese to half, top with chicken mixture, fold over
Cook 2-3 minutes per side until golden and cheese melts
Cut into wedges, serve with salsa or sour cream

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
ingredients: frozen veg (2 cups, peas and carrots)
steps: Scramble eggs in large pan, set aside and chop into pieces
Add butter to pan, sauté onion 2 minutes
Add 4 cups cold cooked rice, stir-fry 3-4 minutes
Add frozen vegetables, cook until heated through
Add eggs back to pan with 3 tbsp soy sauce
Toss everything together and serve

recipes.name: Tuna Melts
steps: Mix tuna with 3 tbsp mayo, salt, and pepper
Butter one side of each bread slice
Place 4 slices butter-side down in skillet
Top with tuna mixture, tomato slices, and cheese
Add remaining bread slices, butter-side up
Cook 3-4 minutes per side until golden and cheese melts

recipes.name: Sheet Pan Sausage & Vegetables
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F
Toss potatoes with 1 tbsp oil, spread on sheet pan, roast 10 minutes
Toss peppers, onion, and zucchini with 1 tbsp oil
Add vegetables and sausage to pan with potatoes
Roast 15 minutes until sausage is cooked through
Season with Italian herbs and serve

recipes.name: Creamy Chicken & Spinach
steps: Season chicken with salt, pepper, and garlic powder
Cook chicken in butter until golden, about 5 minutes per side, set aside
Sauté onion in same pan 2 minutes
Add 1 cup chicken broth and 1/2 cup cream, simmer 3 minutes
Stir in spinach until wilted, add parmesan
Return chicken to pan, simmer 2 minutes, serve over pasta or rice

recipes.name: Simple Shrimp Stir-Fry
steps: Cook shrimp in 1 tbsp oil until pink, about 3 minutes, set aside
Add carrots to pan, cook 2 minutes
Add broccoli and bell peppers, stir-fry 4 minutes
Return shrimp to pan
Add 3 tbsp soy sauce and 1 tsp honey, toss to coat
Serve over rice

recipes.name: Cheesy Baked Potatoes
steps: Microwave potatoes 10-12 minutes until fork-tender
Steam broccoli until tender, about 5 minutes
Cut potatoes open, fluff insides with fork
Add 1 tbsp butter and 2 tbsp sour cream to each potato
Top with broccoli and shredded cheese
Microwave 1 minute to melt cheese, serve immediately

recipes.name: Ground Turkey Taco Bowls
steps: Brown ground turkey with onion in large skillet
Add bell peppers, cook 3 minutes
Season with 1 tbsp taco seasoning and 1/4 cup water
Simmer 5 minutes until sauce thickens
Serve over rice or tortilla chips
Top with tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream

recipes.name: Veggie Egg Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F, grease 12-cup muffin tin
Whisk eggs with salt, pepper, and 2 tbsp milk
Divide spinach, peppers, and onion among muffin cups
Pour egg mixture over vegetables
Top each with shredded cheese
Bake 18-20 minutes until set, let cool 2 minutes before removing

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Wraps
ingredients: chicken breast (1 lb, cooked and sliced)
steps: Chop or shred cooked chicken
Toss chicken with 1/4 cup Caesar dressing
Warm tortillas in microwave 20 seconds
Layer romaine lettuce on each tortilla
Add chicken, tomatoes, and parmesan cheese
Roll up tightly, cut in half diagonally, serve

recipes.name: Beef & Vegetable Soup
steps: Brown ground beef in large pot, drain excess fat
Add 4 cups beef broth and canned tomatoes
Add potatoes and carrots, bring to boil
Reduce heat, simmer 15 minutes
Add green beans, cook 5 more minutes until vegetables are tender
Season with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs, serve with bread

recipes.name: Tofu Veggie Stir-Fry
steps: Press tofu dry, cut into cubes
Fry tofu in 2 tbsp oil until golden on all sides, about 8 minutes
Remove tofu, add carrots to pan, cook 2 minutes
Add broccoli, peppers, and onion, stir-fry 5 minutes
Mix 3 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp cornstarch
Return tofu, add sauce, cook 2 minutes until glossy, serve over rice

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese & Tomato Soup
steps: For soup: Simmer crushed tomatoes with 1 cup broth for 10 minutes
Add 2 tbsp butter, salt, pepper, blend if desired
For sandwiches: Butter bread slices on one side
Place 2 cheese slices between bread, butter-side out
Grill in pan 3 minutes per side until golden
Cut sandwiches diagonally, serve with warm soup

recipes.name: Honey Garlic Chicken
steps: Mix 3 tbsp honey, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 3 cloves minced garlic
Season chicken with salt and pepper
Cook chicken in butter until golden, about 5 minutes per side
Steam broccoli and carrots until tender, about 5 minutes
Pour honey garlic sauce over chicken, simmer 2 minutes
Serve chicken over rice with vegetables on side

recipes.name: Cauliflower Mac & Cheese
steps: Cook 1 lb pasta according to package directions
Steam cauliflower until very tender, about 10 minutes
In saucepan, melt butter, whisk in 2 tbsp flour
Gradually add milk, stir until thickened
Remove from heat, stir in cheese until melted
Toss pasta and cauliflower with cheese sauce, serve hot

recipes.name: Turkey Burger Patties
steps: Mix ground turkey with grated onion, salt, pepper, 1 tsp Worcestershire
Form into 4 patties, slightly larger than buns
Cook in skillet over medium-high heat, 5 minutes per side
Add cheese slice to each patty, cover to melt
Toast buns lightly in same pan
Assemble burgers with tomato and favorite toppings

recipes.name: Sweet Potato & Black Bean Tacos
steps: Roast sweet potato cubes at 400°F for 20 minutes, or microwave 8 minutes
Heat 1 can black beans (drained) with 1/2 tsp cumin
Warm tortillas in dry skillet or microwave
Fill tortillas with sweet potatoes and black beans
Top with diced tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream
Add hot sauce if desired, serve immediately

recipes.name: Pork Chops with Green Beans
steps: Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and garlic powder
Sear pork chops in 1 tbsp butter, 4 minutes per side, set aside
Boil potato cubes until tender, about 12 minutes, drain
Sauté green beans and onion in 1 tbsp butter, 6 minutes
Mash potatoes with remaining butter and splash of milk
Serve pork chops with mashed potatoes and green beans
